info.name: ticket-management
info.description: A comprehensive ticket management system where users can register, log in, view available buses, and purchase tickets. Admins have enhanced capabilities to manage buses, tickets, and system data.

item.name: Auth

request.description:
name - Required,At Least 2 character. Maximum 50 character.

email - Must be in valid format.

password - At least 8 character and Maximum 50character. Password should contain minimum 1 uppercase,1 lowercase and 1 digit

response.name: Validation Error -password
Validation Error -email
Validation Error -name

request.description: This API endpoint is designed to log out a currently authenticated user. Upon successful logout, the user's session token (JWT) is cleared from the client-side, effectively ending the session.

header.value: jwtToken=; Path=/; Expires=Thu, 01 Jan 1970 00:00:00 GMT; HttpOnly; Secure; SameSite=Strict

item.description:
\- User registration, login, and logout.

\- Secure password hashing and JWT-based authentication.

\- Role-based authorization for Admin and User roles.

item.name: Admin Api's
Bus

response.name: Bad Request -bus exist

request.description: **Parameter:** `{`6759dc8a1b1d6c622899e5a4`}`: The unique identifier of the bus to be updated

response.name: Error -duplicate bus number

request.description: {6759dc8a1b1d6c622899e5a4} ->**Parameter:** `{busId}`: The unique identifier of the bus to be deleted

item.description:
**busNumber**: A unique string identifier for the bus, with a maximum length of 50 characters.  
**route**: object containing two required string fields:

from: The starting point of the route, with a maximum length of 50 characters.  
to: The destination of the route, with a maximum length of 50 characters.

**status**: A boolean flag indicating whether the bus is active or inactive, defaulting to true.  
**capacity**: The maximum number of passengers the bus can accommodate, with a minimum value of 1

item.name: Ticket

request.description: {6759487dfe4d4f9dda732ec3} ->**Parameter:** `{ticketId}`: The unique identifier of the ticket to be updated
{6759471abc3f3d88b4d96b0b} ->**Parameter:** `{ticketId}`: The unique identifier of the ticket to be deleted

item.description:
**busId**: A foreign key referencing a specific bus in the database.  
**date**: The date of the bus journey.  
**time**: The departure time of the bus. example: "02:30 pm"  
**price**: The ticket price.  
**availableSeats**: The number of available seats for the ticket.  
EndFragment
Only User with role "admin" are allowed.

item.name: User Api's

request.description: User Get tickets for specific bus, user can also select a date for get a ticket on that specific date.

User chooses bus,ticket and quantity and finally purchase the ticket

Note: Qunatity must be less than or equal available ticket for specific bus

response.name: Not Enough Ticket Available
Not Found

item.description: All authenticated users are allowed to access the User Api's
